flawed_nl_solution:
30% of Mars is made up of other elements because 100 - 50 - 20 = <<100-50-20=10>>10
Mars weighs 500 tons because 150 / 0.3 = <<150/0.3=500>>500
The moon weighs 250 tons because 500 / 2 = <<500/2=250>>250

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 10. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
